name: Better agirls Website
description: This is an improved theme of agirls(agirls.aotter.net) website. I only test this theme on my PC with large screen size, smaller screen size may have some problems. If you find a bug, please feel free to let me know. Thanks! ** IMPORTANT ** Due to the new version of the website, this style is not valid anymore, and will be remove after a couple days. Thank you for installing this!
